company.subTagline: The easiest way to build an online shop

howItWorks.getModernStoreDetails: Join us in making the best e-commerce platform in the region. We depend on your success, and all our decisions are guided by increasing your sales. With that in mind, we have no fixed or hidden costs, and the platform is completely free if the total of your orders within a month is less than 15,000ден!
howItWorks.getModernStoreSmallPrint: We charge a flat fee of 1% interest rate if the total amount is above 15,000ден
howItWorks.heroExplanation: The la.mk platform allows you to create a real online store with no technical knowledge required. Some of the characteristics that make us unique are the ease of use and management of the store, as well as the speed at which we improve.
howItWorks.listAddProductsDetails: Some of the unique characteristics of our platform is that we have no limits on the number of products you can have. Setting discounts, managing inventory, and grouping products have never been easier.
howItWorks.listCreateStoreDetails: Opening a store is now a simple process. With only few clicks you will have your own place on the internet to sell. The only steps you need to do is specify your store name, choose a free domain for it, and place your logo. That's all!
howItWorks.listDeliveryPaymentPreferences: Specify your delivery and payment preferences
howItWorks.listDeliveryPaymentPreferencesDetails: You decide how the orders are fulfilled, and how much that costs. Specify free delivery for orders over a price you decide. You can choose payment on delivery, or credit card payments, and the money will be transferred directly to your bank account.
howItWorks.listDiscountCampaigns: Organize sales, discount campaigns, and much more...
howItWorks.listDiscountCampaignsDetails: Creating discount campaigns, for all or part of your products is fast and easy. Your store's design automatically adapts to promote your campaigns at the right moment.
howItWorks.listOrdersDetails: Get a detailed overview over all of your orders, and get all necessary information about the customers. Print invoices with a single click, and ship it together with the ordered products. You can also set the status of the order, so your customers can easily track the order status, until it arrives in their home.

landing.corePointsAdmin: Admin panel for the modern age
landing.corePointsAdminDetails: Manage your products, orders, campaigns and more from a single place. The built-in analytics give you an overview of your orders, revenue, and visits of your online store
landing.corePointsStoreDetails: Super fast, SEO optimized, and easy to use online store. Your job is to manage your products, and our responsibility is to take care of the rest. We handle the complexity of keeping your store fast, easy to use, and available 24x7, all you need to do is sell
landing.corePointsSupportDetails: We are here to help with whatever you need. Whether you are stuck, or you have a feature you can't live without, we want to hear from you. Message us using the built-in chat in the admin panel, and we will help you succeed
landing.stepAddProductsDetails: We have no limits, so add as many as you want
landing.stepCreateStoreDetails: Sign up, tell us your store name, add your logo, and you're ready to sell
landing.stepStartSellingDetails: Add your preferred delivery and payment methods, and start selling
landing.warmingUpDetails: This is just the beginning. Our goal is, together with you, to create and maintain the best platform in the region. Join us now!

landingContact.heroExplanation: If you have trouble understanding how to use the platform, or something doesn't work as expected, we are here to help. It is our pleasure to help you succeed, and answer any questions you might have.
landingContact.messageExplanation: Tell us more about your business or question
landingContact.thanksForContactDetails: We will get back to you as soon as possible

landingFaq.additionalExplanation: If you have a question that is not answered here, feel free to reach us using the contact form, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
landingFaq.heroExplanation: Our philosophy is full transparency towards our clients. You can find answers to the most common questions here
landingFaq.paymentsAnswerSupportedMethods: Currently we support payment on delivery and credit card payments. If we currently don't support your bank, we can work together and add support for it within 1 week
landingFaq.paymentsQuestionSupportedMethods: What payment methods can I use?
landingFaq.pricingAnswerHowMuch: It's completely free for orders total of up to 15,000 ден within a single month. If the total of your orders is above 15,000 ден, we will charge a flat fee of 1% interest rate. For example, if you have 15 orders in January, and the total amount is 14,000ден, then our platform is completely free of charge. If in February you have 30 orders with a total amount of 26,000ден, then you need to pay 260ден for using our platform.
landingFaq.pricingAnswerSignContract: There are no contracts or obligations, you can stop using the platform whenever you want, no strings attached.
landingFaq.pricingQuestionSignContract: Do I need to sign a contract?
landingFaq.generalQuestionNeedToStartSell: What do I need to start selling?
landingFaq.generalAnswerNeedToStartSell: You only need to register at admin.la.mk, follow the three simple steps to set up your store, and that's it! You automatically get a well-designed store, and an admin panel through which you can manage your orders, products, and campaigns.
landingFaq.generalQuestionTechnicalKnowledge: Do I need any technical knowledge to create a store?
landingFaq.generalAnswerTechnicalKnowledge: Not at all, anyone can create a store in only a few steps. We take care of hosting, maintaining, and adding new functionalities to your store, all you need to is sell.
landingFaq.generalAnswerSupportedLanguage: We currently support Macedonian and English, but we can easily add support for other languages on request.
landingFaq.generalAnswerGetHelp: You can message us through the built-in chat in the admin panel, or send us an e-mail at contact@la.mk, and we'll try to get back to you as soon as possible.
landingFaq.adminQuestionCustomDomain: Can I use my own domain?
landingFaq.adminAnswerCustomDomain: Every store gets a free la.mk sub-domain (eg. demo.la.mk), which should be enough for most stores. If that doesn't suit your needs, you can contact us and we will connect your own domain to the store, and manage your certificate, all for free.
landingFaq.adminQuestionSeo: Do I need to do anything get good SEO?
landingFaq.adminAnswerSeo: We make sure your store is SEO-optimized. All you need to do is name your products well and write a detailed description, and we take care of everything else.
landingFaq.adminQuestionCustomDesign: Can I choose a different design for my store?
landingFaq.adminAnswerCustomDesign: We currently provide a single, highly optimized template that should fit most of your needs. We plan to provide a few more designs soon that just work, so we can satisfy the personal preferences of every store
landingFaq.paymentsQuestionCardDirectly: Do I get credit card payments directly to my bank account?
landingFaq.paymentsAnswerCardDirectly: Yes! All credit card payments are processed by your bank and transferred directly to your bank account.
landingFaq.paymentsQuestionCardExplain: How can I enable card payments?
landingFaq.paymentsAnswerCardExplain: You need to apply for e-commerce payments at your company's bank with a short business plan. Once they approve your application, they will send you a couple of ID and password information, which you simply input in the admin panel, and you're set!

landingBlog.heroExplanation: Want to learn more about e-commerce? Want to open an online store in Macedonia? We share tips about opening an online business, marketing tips, and more

legal.legalNotAvailable: We are still preparing our legal policies, reach out for more information
legal.legalExplanation: We make sure to be compliant with all regulations and laws. We have taken all security measures and limit the amount of data we collect to the bare minimum while still providing a smooth user experience

seoDescriptions.product_plural: Shop online thousands of products in one place. Quickest way to buy online in Macedonia. We offer high-quality products at affordable prices. Join us now
seoDescriptions.storeGeneric: The easiest way to shop in Macedonia, from the comfort of your home. Online shopping could never be easier. Start shopping.

services.returnPolicyExplanation: Return what you don't like, risk-free

store.watchLamkIntro: Learn how to get started with la.mk
store.watchLamkIntroExplanation: If you are not sure how to get started, follow our step-by-step guide where we guide you how to prepare your store, add your products, and start selling in no time.
